summary: This document is an email chain from January 28, 2020, providing detailed aircraft registration and flight plan information for helicopters and jets associated with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein. It includes data on tail numbers, ownership history, and registration details, sent in response to an investigator's request to establish travel timelines.

persons.name: Jason
persons.context: The primary recipient of the email who requested aircraft information for an investigation, likely related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Noelle Maxwell
persons.context: Identified as a private pilot who personally piloted a helicopter (Sikorsky S-76C, tail N722JE) and was a frequent passenger on jets associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as someone Ghislaine Maxwell traveled with frequently; aircraft are associated with him.

persons.name: Lawrence P. Visoski, Jr.
persons.context: Signed the current registration for helicopter N722JE for Hyperion Air LLC on July 17, 2019.

persons.name: James D. Clark
persons.context: Signed as the seller for ASI Wings LLC when helicopter N722JE was purchased on June 13, 2019.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Signed the registration of helicopter N722JE for Freedom Air International, Inc. on August 2, 2010, and later signed as seller for Hyperion Air, Inc. for helicopter N331JE on August 12, 2013.

persons.name: Larry Visoski
persons.context: Signed the registration of helicopter N722JE for Air Ghislaine, Inc. on December 29, 2008.

persons.name: William P. Merriam Jr
persons.context: Signed as the seller for Bovale Developments, Inc. when helicopter N331JE was purchased on March 6, 2012.

persons.name: Van Heurck
persons.context: A surname presented as a potential pilot of one of the aircraft, with the sender asking if it has relevance to the case.

connections.description: Maxwell traveled with Epstein frequently on the aircraft listed.
Visoski signed aircraft registration documents for helicopters owned by entities (Hyperion Air LLC) associated with Maxwell.
Indyke signed registration and sale documents for aircraft (N722JE, N331JE) linked to Maxwell's entities.

events.title: Start of Flight Plan Records
events.description: The sender notes that the earliest flight plan information provided begins around 2007, when such record-keeping started.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell's Pilot Certificate Issued
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was issued a Private Pilot certificate.

events.title: Purchase of Sikorsky S-76C Helicopter
events.description: Aircraft later registered as N722JE (Air Ghislaine 2) was purchased from Sikorsky.

events.title: Current Registration of N722JE
events.description: Helicopter N722JE (Air Ghislaine 2) had its current registration issued to Hyperion Air LLC, signed by Lawrence P. Visoski, Jr.

events.title: Current Registration of N331JE
events.description: Helicopter N331JE had its current registration issued to Hyperion Air, LLC, signed by Lawrence Visoski.

keyFacts: The document provides flight plan data (from 2007 onward) and registration details for helicopters N722JE (Air Ghislaine 2), N331JE, and N491GM (Air Ghislaine 1), as well as several private jets (N2121E, N1201E, N9091E, N9081E) associated with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.
Ghislaine Maxwell is confirmed as a private pilot who personally piloted the Sikorsky S-76C helicopter (tail N722JE) and was a frequent passenger on the jets.

Ownership of the aircraft involves multiple corporate entities, including Hyperion Air LLC, Air Ghislaine Inc. (later Shmitka Air Inc.), Freedom Air International, Inc., ASI Wings LLC, and Bovale Developments, Inc.

Key individuals who signed registration and sale documents include Lawrence P. Visoski, Jr., Darren K. Indyke, James D. Clark, and William P. Merriam Jr., indicating a network used to manage the aircraft assets.
The correspondence is part of a high-profile investigation, with the sender emphasizing discretion and offering to provide certified copies of documents for potential court use.
